title: Sawirrada
description: Ku dar sawirro tayo sare leh si aad u soo bandhigto hantidaada.
chooseMethod: Sidee doonaysaa inaad ku darto sawirro?
cameraRollPermission: Waxaan u baahanahay gelitaan maktabadda sawirradaada si aan u darsano sawirro.
cameraPermission: Waxaan u baahanahay gelitaan kamaradda si aan u qaadno sawirro.
uploadError: Waxaa fashilmay kor u qaadidda sawirrada. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
pickError: Waxaa fashilmay doorashada sawirrada. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
cameraError: Waxaa fashilmay qaadista sawirka. Fadlan mar kale isku day.
tipContent: Sawirrada tayo saraha ah ayaa ka caawiya martida inay faham fiican ka helaan hantidaada oo kordhinaya buukinta. Isticmaal iftiinka dabiiciga ah oo soo bandhig sifooyinkaaga ugu fiican.
tips: Isticmaal iftiinka dabiiciga ah markaas u suurto gal
Ku dar meelo kala duwan oo meeshaada ah
Ku hay sawirrada hadda iyo kuwo sax ah
minRequired: Ugu yaraan 5 sawir ayaa loo baahan yahay
photoQualityHelp: Sawirrada tayo saraha ah ayaa kordhiya heerkii buukinta
photoLimit: Ugu badan 20 sawir la ogol yahay
photoSizeLimit: Cabbirka sawirka waa inuu ka yar yahay 10MB
